duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical leadership and mentorship to staff.
Support well design and delivery processes (FELs, AFE’s).
Provide integrated characterization, maps and updates for the GMT2 field.
Maintain, update, and support the G&G products needed to maintain the integration of the GMT2 maps, cross sections, and geomodels.
Propose, evaluate, and integrate a wide spectrum of data types into an evergreen holistic understanding of the GMT2 field.
Provide geosteering and operational support for an ongoing drilling program.
Provide geologic/geophysical support and guidance for regulatory agencies and external stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Geology or Geophysics or foreign equivalent
